aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair of a resource

CreateDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to create one or more DNS record entries for a domain resource: Address (A), canonical name (CNAME), mail exchanger (MX), name server (NS), start of authority (SOA), service locator (SRV), or text (TXT)

DeleteDomain.description: Grants permission to delete a domain resource and all of its DNS records

DeleteDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to delete a DNS record entry for a domain resource

UpdateDomainEntry.description: Grants permission to update a domain recordset after it is created

TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair that is allowed in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by a list of tag keys that are allowed in the request

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

CloseInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to close a public port of an instance

DeleteInstance.description: Grants permission to delete an instance

DeleteKnownHostKeys.description: Grants permission to delete the known host key or certificate used by the Amazon Lightsail browser-based SSH or RDP clients to authenticate an instance

GetInstanceAccessDetails.description: Grants permission to get temporary keys you can use to authenticate and connect to an instance

OpenInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to add, or open a public port of an instance

PutInstancePublicPorts.description: Grants permission to set the specified open ports for an instance, and closes all ports for every protocol not included in the request

RebootInstance.description: Grants permission to reboot an instance that is in a running state

SetIpAddressType.description: Grants permission to set the IP address type for a Amazon Lightsail resource

SetResourceAccessForBucket.description: Grants permission to set the Amazon Lightsail resources that can access the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

StartInstance.description: Grants permission to start an instance that is in a stopped state

StopInstance.description: Grants permission to stop an instance that is in a running state

UpdateInstanceMetadataOptions.description: Grants permission to update metadata options for an instance

DeleteContainerImage.description: Grants permission to delete a container image that is registered to your Amazon Lightsail container service

RegisterContainerImage.description: Grants permission to register a container image to your Amazon Lightsail container service

AttachCertificateToDistribution.description: Grants permission to attach an SSL/TLS certificate to your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

DeleteDistribution.description: Grants permission to delete your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

DetachCertificateFromDistribution.description: Grants permission to detach an SSL/TLS certificate from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

ResetDistributionCache.description: Grants permission to delete currently cached content from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution
